entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his patience and kindness. He is described as 'patiently' speaking to the students.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who raises her hand to answer Hagrid's question. She is described as 'beaming at her'.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who arrives unexpectedly and is described as wearing her green hat and cloak.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. Hagrid awards ten points to Gryffindor for Hermione's correct answer.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: Thestral is a magical creature that can only be seen by people who have seen death. It is described as making a 'hem, hem' sound.
